name: unrelaxed
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
worried or not comfortable: He's still tense and unrelaxed around new people. Her head and shoulders were unrelaxed. Compare
relaxed
More examplesFewer examplesThe leading actor looks unrelaxed and unnatural in his period costume and wig.Sometimes these days he's so unrelaxed he can't play his normal game.He insists that his performers should be constantly unsettled and unrelaxed on stage.Several of the new mothers admitted that they had felt very anxious or unrelaxed during breast-feeding.She lay there, tense and unrelaxed.
